JobFullDesc: Do you have a passion for solving complex problems and want to be part of the team that manages, operates and delivers security and quality improvements to all the devices in the Windows ecosystem? If the answer is yes, then this could be your next career move! Our charter is to be the catalyst in achieving our Windows as a Service goal by delivering seamless update experiences to all our Windows Customers (Enterprise, Mission Critical systems, Home, Mobile and other connected devices like HoloLens & Windows IoT). We are looking for a developer who can join our successful team and help us accelerate the transformation of our update services through the shift to be modern, scalable and cloud-based. You will also participate in the engineering evolution of our traditional update systems and processes. This is an amazing opportunity and your work will help us expand our capabilities across the growing portfolio of Microsoft Products!ResponsibilitiesPrimary Responsibilities:Contribute to all phases (design, prototype, implement, test) of our modern, scalable, cloud-based update creation service.Understand requirements and create complete design specifications.Utilize next generation, cutting edge technologies such as Azure Service Fabric, Logic Apps, Cosmos DB, to build reliable, highly available, and scalable solutions.Working cross-team to integrate with partner teams and their systems in a highly dynamic environmentDebug and investigate live-site issues to ensure proper availability and delivery of updates.QualificationsBasic Qualifications:BS in Computer Science or equivalent, or4+ years of Software Development experience using C++/C / Java required.  Preferred Qualifications:Strong software engineering skills in C++ across all phases of software development lifecycleAbility to understand unfamiliar code bases, and debug server-side, multi-threaded, and highly scalable applicationsCreative and innovative thinkingGood communication, critical thinking, and collaborations skills.Experience with agile/scrum methodologiesExperience developing with Azure technologies (Service Fabric, Logic Apps, Azure Storage)Additional languages such as Perl, Scripting, PowerShellMicrosoft is an equal opportunity employer.
